plot: A boy leaves the comforts of his family home. He embarks on an epic journey, ultimately finding himself and his new family at the end.
title: The Bike Ride
plot_es: A boy leaves the comforts of his family home. He embarks on an epic journey, ultimately finding himself and his new family at the end.
